MenueSystem

Class Label

  • java.lang.Object
    • MenueSystem.Panel
      • MenueSystem.Label
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Button, LabeledBar

    public class Label
extends Panel
    Will maintain a label which can display a string of text at a given position
    Author:
    Michael Letter

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class MenueSystem.Panel

      • getTextVisibility

        Returns:

      • setVisibility

        public void setVisibility(boolean visible,
                          boolean effectSubPanels)
        Will set whether or not this Label is Visible
        Overrides:
        setVisibility in class Panel
        Parameters:
        visible - If TRUE, this Label will be made visible. If FALSE, this Label will be made invisible
        effectSubPanels - If TRUE, all of this Label's subPanels visibility settings will be set to match this Label's visibility settings. If FALSE, only this Label's visibility setting will be affcted

        Parameters:
        move - the amount that this Button will be moved by
